long_description: The Mountainsmith Vibe TLS waistpack sports a svelte design that is ideal for walking, travel and personal organization for your wallet, keys and phone when you're on the go. Breathable hipbelt and ergonomic lumbar pad offer a comfortable fit. Main compartment features a key clip and laminated mesh organizer pocket. Fleece-lined front pocket with headphone port accommodates a smart phone or MP3 player. The Mountainsmith Vibe TLS waistpack is made with recycled PET along with high-tenacity nylon in key wear areas.
short_description: The Mountainsmith Vibe TLS waistpack sports a svelte design that is ideal for walking, travel and personal organization for your wallet, keys and phone when you're on the go.
